game.name: Rapunzel Chicken And Broccoli Alfredo
game.description:
Your favourite princess Rapunzel is pretty excited to try out a new recipe in her kitchen today. You as a player in this cute free online cooking game will have to help prepare some delicious pasta with broccoli and chicken for the coming cooking contest. Rapunzel Chicken and Broccoli Alfredo is an excellent cooking game for girls where you need to implement a lot of skills in order to complete your mission successfully. Your positive attitude will definitely help to cook the recipe timely and bring a smile on the face of this cute heroine from Disney.

This is a brand new cooking game where you will get a chance to learn how to make some scrumptious spaghetti with chicken and broccoli. All you need to be very careful while accomplishing all the tasks of this cool flash game since it is a quite challenging job. The proper usage of the mouse will help make the pasta recipe with Rapunzel before the time runs out. Use a knife to cut the broccoli in the first place. After cutting it, you will have to put it in a bowl for the next step. Then put the pasta and mix some water in the same bowl and leave it to be boiled for a few minutes. 

At the top of the screen, you will find out the pasta keeping in a cupboard. Let them boiled at 30 degrees and then get ready to cook the chicken to complete the recipe in this brand new online cooking game for girls. Keep your eyes at what Rapunzel is saying since missing even a single step might result in delivering the bad outcomes. Apply your cooking skills and patience to become a real chef in this fabulous fun kitchen game for kids!
